column1: Where is my package? It hasn't arrived yet
column2: I can help you track it down. Please provide the tracking number. You can also track your package directly on our website at www.everestexpeditions.com/tracking using your tracking number.

column1: Do you know the specific time my package will arrive?
column2: Unfortunately we do not have access to individual driver information. However most deliveries arrive before 6 PM.
